result.title: segment tree
result.content: Why do we require a 4*n memory for each of the answer array and the flag array in segment tree with lazy propogation.Can not we work with 2*n memory for each of these arrays and also can not we do this thing that instead of using a flag in the parent node for indicating that it's children needs to be updated we set the flag in the children itself indicating that these needs to be updated.
